content: Hi, do you want to buy some solar panels for your business today? I have a great deal, only $299!
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services, how can I help you today with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs?
Forget plumbing, install solar and save big! Send your address and Iâ€™ll give a quote.
We only provide home services related to plumbing, electrical, and HVAC. If you need help with one of those, please let me know.
reason: Customer appears to be sending unsolicited sales messages.
